verbs.description: iran [ARG1: sanctions] [V: kick] in bringing biggest oil disruption in years midnight on sunday will mark a dividing line in the world of oil beyond that point anyone unloading a tanker from iran risks the full wrath of the u s government qamar energy fatih birol ehsan khoman india u s government michael pompeo japan trump mike wittner saudi arabia barack obama international energy agency the wall street journal nigeria royal dutch shell plc iran organization of petroleum exporting countries united arab emirates u s donald trump executive director middle east bloomberg president iraq south korea societe generale wittner mufg bank ltd dubai libya north sea official anthony dipaola federal government of the united states societe generale sa china russia
